verses.verse: Jude,<WG2455> a servant<WG1401> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> and<WG1161> brother<WG80> of James,<WG2385> to those who are called,<WG2822> sanctified<WG37> by<WG1722> God<WG2316> the Father,<WG3962> and<WG2532> kept<WG5083> for Jesus<WG2424> Christ:<WG5547>
Mercy<WG1656> to you<WG5213> and<WG2532> peace<WG1515> and<WG2532> love<WG26> be multiplied.<WG4129>

Beloved,<WG27> while I was<WG3956> very<WG3956> eager<WG4160> to write<WG1125> to you<WG5213> about<WG4012> our common<WG2839> salvation,<WG4991> I<WG2192> was<WG2192> constrained<WG318> to write<WG1125> to you<WG5213> exhorting<WG3870> you to contend<WG1864> earnestly for the faith<WG4102> which was<WG3860> once<WG530> for all delivered<WG3860> to the saints.<WG40>

For<WG1063> there are<WG3921> certain<WG5100> men<WG444> who crept in secretly,<WG3921> even those who were<WG4270> long<WG3819> ago written<WG4270> about for<WG1519> this<WG5124> condemnation:<WG2917> ungodly men,<WG765> turning<WG3346> the grace<WG5485> of<WG2316> our<WG2257> God<WG2316> into<WG1519> indecency,<WG766> and<WG2532> denying<WG720> our<WG2316> only<WG3441> Master,<WG1203> God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> <WG2257> Lord,<WG1203> Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>

Now<WG1161> I desire<WG1014> to<WG5279> remind<WG5279> you,<WG5209> though<WG1492> you<WG5209> already<WG530> know<WG1492> this,<WG5124> that<WG3754> the Lord,<WG2962> having saved<WG4982> a people<WG2992> out of<WG1537> the land<WG1093> of Egypt,<WG125> afterward<WG1208> destroyed<WG622> those who didn't<WG3361> believe.<WG4100>

Angels<WG32> who didn't<WG3361> keep<WG5083> their<WG1438> first domain,<WG746> but<WG235> deserted<WG620> their own<WG2398> dwelling<WG3613> place,<WG5083> he has kept in<WG1199> everlasting<WG126> bonds<WG1199> under<WG5259> darkness<WG2217> for<WG1519> the judgment<WG2920> of the<WG2250> great<WG3173> day.<WG2250>

Even as<WG5613> Sodom<WG4670> and<WG2532> Gomorrah,<WG1116> and<WG2532> the cities<WG4172> around<WG4012> them,<WG846> having,<WG5158> in the same<WG3664> <WG5125> way<WG5158> as these,<WG1608> given themselves over to sexual immorality and<WG2532> gone<WG565> after<WG3694> strange<WG2087> flesh,<WG4561> are set forth<WG4295> as an example,<WG1164> suffering<WG5254> the punishment<WG4442> of<WG4442> eternal<WG166> fire.<WG4442>

Yet in the same<WG3668> way,<WG3778> these also<WG2532> in their dreaming<WG1797> defile<WG3392> the flesh,<WG4561> despise<WG114> authority,<WG2963> and<WG1161> slander<WG987> celestial beings.<WG1161>

But<WG1161> Michael,<WG3413> the archangel,<WG743> when<WG3753> contending<WG1252> with the devil<WG1228> and arguing<WG1256> about<WG4012> the body<WG4983> of Moses,<WG3475> dared<WG5111> not<WG3756> bring against him<WG2018> an<WG2920> abusive<WG988> condemnation,<WG2920> but<WG235> said,<WG2036> "May the Lord<WG2962> rebuke<WG2008> you!<WG4671>"

But<WG3303> these<WG3778> speak evil<WG987> of whatever<WG3745> things they don't<WG3756> know.<WG1492> What<WG3745> they understand<WG1987> naturally,<WG5447> like<WG5613> the creatures<WG2226> without reason,<WG249> they are destroyed<WG1161> in<WG1722> these things.<WG5125>

Woe<WG3759> to them!<WG846> For<WG3754> they went<WG4198> in the way<WG3598> of Cain,<WG2535> and<WG2532> ran riotously<WG1632> in the error<WG4106> of Balaam<WG903> for hire,<WG3408> and<WG2532> perished<WG622> in Korah<WG2879>'s rebellion.<WG485>

These<WG3778> are<WG1526> hidden rocky reefs<WG4694> in<WG1722> your<WG5216> love<WG26> feasts when they feast with<WG4910> you,<WG5213> shepherds who without fear<WG870> feed<WG4165> themselves;<WG1438> clouds<WG3507> without water,<WG504> carried along<WG4064> by<WG5259> winds;<WG417> autumn<WG5352> leaves<WG1186> without fruit,<WG175> twice<WG1364> dead,<WG599> plucked up by the roots;<WG1610>

wild<WG66> waves<WG2949> of the sea,<WG2281> foaming out<WG1890> their own<WG1438> shame;<WG152> wandering<WG4107> stars,<WG792> for whom<WG3739> the blackness<WG2217> of darkness<WG4655> has been reserved<WG5083> <WG1519> forever.<WG165>

About<WG1161> these<WG5125> also<WG2532> Enoch,<WG1802> the seventh<WG1442> from<WG575> Adam,<WG76> prophesied,<WG4395> saying,<WG3004> "Behold,<WG2400> the Lord<WG2962> came<WG2064> with<WG1722> ten thousands<WG3461> of<WG40> his<WG846> holy ones,<WG40>

to execute<WG4160> judgment<WG2920> on<WG2596> all,<WG3956> and<WG2532> to convict<WG1827> all<WG3956> the ungodly<WG765> of<WG4012> all<WG3956> their<WG846> works<WG2041> of<WG4012> ungodliness<WG763> which<WG3739> they have done<WG764> in an ungodly way,<WG2532> and of<WG4012> all<WG3956> the hard<WG4642> things which<WG3739> ungodly<WG765> sinners<WG268> have spoken<WG2980> against<WG2596> him.<WG846>"

These<WG3778> are<WG1526> murmurers<WG1113> and complainers,<WG3202> walking<WG4198> after<WG2596> their lusts<WG1939> (and<WG2532> their<WG846> mouth<WG4750> speaks<WG2980> proud<WG5246> things<WG2296>), showing respect<WG2296> of<WG5484> persons<WG4383> to gain<WG5484> advantage.<WG5622>

But<WG1161> you,<WG5210> beloved,<WG27> remember<WG3415> the words<WG4487> which have been spoken before<WG4280> by<WG5259> the apostles<WG652> of<WG5259> our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>

They said<WG3004> to you<WG5213> that<WG3754> "In<WG1722> the<WG5550> last<WG2078> time<WG5550> there will be<WG2071> mockers,<WG1703> walking<WG4198> after<WG2596> their own<WG1438> ungodly<WG763> lusts.<WG3754>"
These<WG3778> are<WG1526> they who<WG1438> cause divisions,<WG592> and are sensual,<WG5591> not<WG3361> having<WG2192> the Spirit.<WG4151>

But<WG1161> you,<WG5210> beloved,<WG27> keep building up<WG2026> yourselves<WG1438> on<WG4102> your<WG5216> most holy<WG40> faith,<WG4102> praying<WG4336> in<WG1722> the<WG4151> Holy<WG40> Spirit.<WG4151>

Keep<WG5083> yourselves<WG1438> in<WG1722> the love<WG26> of God,<WG2316> looking for<WG4327> the mercy<WG1656> of<WG2962> our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> to<WG1519> eternal<WG166> life.<WG2222>
On<WG2532> some<WG3739> have compassion,<WG1653> making a distinction,<WG3303>

and<WG1161> some<WG3739> save,<WG4982> snatching<WG726> them out of<WG1537> the fire<WG4442> with<WG1722> fear,<WG5401> hating<WG3404> even<WG2532> the clothing<WG5509> stained<WG4695> by<WG575> the flesh.<WG4561>

Now<WG1161> to him who is able<WG1410> to keep<WG5442> them<WG5209> from stumbling,<WG679> and<WG2532> to present<WG2476> you faultless<WG299> before the presence<WG2714> of<WG1391> his<WG846> glory<WG1391> in<WG1722> great joy,<WG20>

to<WG2316> God<WG2316> our<WG2257> Savior,<WG4990> who alone<WG3441> is wise,<WG4680> be glory<WG1391> and<WG2532> majesty,<WG3172> dominion<WG2904> and<WG2532> power,<WG1849> both<WG2532> now<WG3568> and<WG2532> forever.<WG3956> Amen.<WG281>
